bibl.title: καὶ ὡς χρηματίζει and the Importance of Naming in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The Attestations. - Documents with καὶ ὡς χρηματίζει. - What does καὶ ὡς χρηματίζει replace? - An elite designation with Latin roots? - 'However else he may be styled'? - καὶ ὡς χρηματίζει and Roman rule.
